message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take 60 and you get 40.
Let's try a bit more balanced approach.
Time is money, Bob!  I'll take a little less, but this needs to be settled soon.
Getting impatient too, Alice. Meet me in the middle won't work, I need a bit more.
Okay, Bob, let's stop this back and forth. A clean 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.
